title: I bugsplat right as the loading screen pops up a lot.
body: For the past couple of months I have just had my game crash upon loading up and saying my files are corrupted. I have tried everything from the hextech repair tool to uninstalling and reinstalling the game. I have probably lost 200+ lp and received multiple leaverbusters from it and recently just got demoted from it. I was wondering if anyone else had this problem or a fix for it really appreciate it very very frustrated right now and just sad. T-T

replies.body:
i have the exact same problem
i keep getting multiple leavebusters beacuse of this error :(
Please help us Riot

Since you've tried uninstalling/reinstalling and you're still getting bug splats, it could be due to some kind of software issue such as outdated drivers. If your graphics drivers are not up to date, it could cause your game to crash if it can't display everything properly. Follow our [Bug Splat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to see if we can get to the bottom of this.

Hit me up if you've got any questions.
